title: SOUTH INDIAN RICE AND LENTIL PORRIDGE [VEGAN]
directions: Place the rice, dal, ginger, salt, turmeric water and salt and black pepper in the instant pot. Pressure cook on high for 8 minutes. Do a quick steam release and stir well.
Heat the ghee or clarified butter in a small skillet and add in the black mustard seeds and wait until the seeds crackle.
Add the dried red chilies and the cashew nuts and cook for 30 seconds. Add the curry leaves and pour the mixture over the rice and lentil mixture and stir well.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon turmeric (optional, note this is usually not added)
